title: Beetroot with onion and cumin
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 1/2 teaspoons cumin seed', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '5 medium beetroots, peeled and quartered', '2 tomatoes - peeled, seeded and chopped', '375ml water', '1 teaspoon salt']
